packages.name: hero-knn
packages.description: A library for implementing and training k-nearest neighbors classifiers with added functionality for data manipulation and preprocessing

functions.function_summary: Trains the k-nearest neighbors classifier with a given dataset and labels
Classifies a given input data point using the trained k-nearest neighbors classifier
Normalizes a given dataset using min-max normalization for preprocessing
Calculates the distance between two data points using a specified distance metric (Euclidean, Manhattan, etc.)
